hymn.title: God is Spirit, and He comes
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—The Two Spirits as One

layout.singingstanza: God is Spir -- it, and He comes As the Spir -- it in -- to man. To man's spir -- it He will come To be one, one with man. There He'll live and make His home— The two spir -- its will be one. As the Spir -- it, God will come In -- to me, in -- to me!

lyrics.stanza: God is Spirit, and He comes As the Spirit into man. To man's spirit He will come To be one, one with man. There He'll live and make His home— The two spirits will be one. As the Spirit, God will come Into me, into me!
